name: Shrinking Professor
overview: You are a professor in your laboratory. A potion you were mixing slips from your grasp and spills. A choking green fume overcomes you. A fuzzy sleep strikes you down. When you awake, to your horror you find that your body is less than one inch in height. The only way to regain your height is to get to the top of the lab table, where there are some crystals that will restore you.
